name: SISTERS: A conversation by proxie
description:
Can you resolve a feud that has festered through the ages?

Sisters is a relatively small and experimental RPG maker XP game, based on the concept of repetition and the nature of good and bad. You play the part of an average person taken out of their ‘normal’ dull life and dumped into a garish unfamiliar world where things are not as they may first appear.

The game has a percentage score that is intended to help the player gauge their progress towards the Seven possible endings and finding all the story parts. It also keeps a permanent account of the endings achieved over various games you play, and different game paths can lead to different endings becoming available. So regular saving is recommended.

Can you get 100% score and all 7 endings?


I wouldn't personally call this a horror game, but others have! Id say it's a Rogue-like as in when you die you die and have to restart or call up a saved game. Origonaly made as a test project to try out some things in RPG maker this grew into a rather unusual - non RPG'ish - game. This is primarily an 'ideas' peice.

**The game is not encrypted and has the RPGXP Project file included. Please feel free to examine and use this code as you wish.
